author: Jessica Moran
title: Eddie Pridmore had hepatitis in the 1960s. He has a message for the COVID-19 era
description: A former patient at Launceston's first purpose-built infectious diseases hospital wants Tasmanians to heed the warnings to stay home and stay safe.
content:
Posted 
April 04, 2020 12:28:53
Eddie Pridmore was 12 years old when he contracted hepatitis A during an outbreak in Tasmania in the early 1960s.
"There was a lot of concern about how it was spreading, cases seemed to be popping up everywhere and no-one kn… [+3734 chars]
